title: The Hatred Prophecy
description: The day of reckoning is coming.Eighteen-year-old Seraphine Arrow has always been in love with Prince Gideon of Myrida, and he with her. Even in spite of Gideon’s long-standing betrothal to Seraphine’s best friend, Princess Annette of Cerdana. With war looming as the Fae draw closer, an alliance between the two countries becomes essential. Gideon’s father, the king, pushes for an immediate wedding.Annette, intent on proving she has what it takes to be Gideon’s queen in spite of his desire for Seraphine, meets secretly with Myridian rebels, but falls prey to blackmail. Lemuel, an undercover faerie, has always yearned for Annette, but he’s determined to uphold a promise made long ago. Masquerading as Gideon’s most trusted guard, he’ll ensure Gideon's path to the throne, no matter what it takes. It may be the only way to secure peace between faeries and mortals.But when the king is assassinated, Gideon struggles between his forbidden love for Seraphine and his new responsibilities as king. With Gideon and Annette’s impending marriage hanging over her heart like a knife, and a secret that could endanger her life, Seraphine consults an oracle. The oracle’s prophecy is horrifying: hatred is threatening to destroy the kingdom.Only one of the young women will survive.The Hatred Prophecy is a fast-paced, YA fantasy romance story between friends who are forced to become enemies. Readers who love A Court of Thorns and Roses by Sarah J Maas and Serpent and Dove by Shelby Mahurin will love this magical first installment of the Hatred Prophecy series!
author: Guinevere Leigh
